G

P

PathItem - Class in usbbackup
Custom cell factory for UI ListView with a delete button.

R

removeFiles(List<File>) - Static method in class usbbackup.Settings
removes all the files from settings that are passed
run() - Method in class usbbackup.Backup
Method accomplishes the backup process, all you got to do is call it and it will take care of everything
